text: Cors Nantcwnlle is a Site of Special Scientific Interest near Bwlchllan in Ceredigion, west Wales. Until the early twentieth century the site was renowned for peat cutting. Now it is noted for its unique ecology, including rare sphagnums (peat mosses), ==See also== *List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion Category:Protected areas established in 2000 Category:2000 establishments in Wales
title: Cors Nantcwnlle
